Flow.description: 05-03-2024 JK: updated the Create Opportunity to also populate the Account and Primary Contact fields 15/03/2023 DB: Removed Get Leads element to reduce queries. Lead record is passed in. Update Lead element now in parent flow (Auto Convert). Lead no longer converted per subflow. 09/03/2023 CH: Updated Lead professional checks 16/10/2023 CH: changed contact owner for NH Professional 24/01/2023: DB create Opportunity before Lead auto convert (if auto convert create opportunity is true)

formulas.name: form_Error
formulas.expression: IF(AND(ISNULL({!sov_Lead.Account__c}),ISNULL({!sov_Lead.Contact__c})),"No Account and Contact found", IF(AND(ISNULL({!sov_Lead.Account__c}),NOT(ISNULL({!sov_Lead.Contact__c}))),"No Account found", IF(AND(NOT(ISNULL({!sov_Lead.Account__c})),ISNULL({!sov_Lead.Contact__c})),"No Contact found","")))

formulas.name: OpportunityCloseDateFormula
formulas.expression: IF( NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT({!sov_Lead.Sales_season__c}))), DATE(VALUE(RIGHT(TEXT({!sov_Lead.Sales_season__c}), 4)),07,31), IF( TODAY() < DATE(YEAR(TODAY()),07,31), DATE(Year(TODAY()),07,31), DATE(Year(TODAY())+1,07,31) ) )

Flow.label: Auto Convert
